element.label: *Title
element.errorMessage: Element must occur at least 1 time(s) and no more than 1 time(s).

element.label: Link to Zotero record
element.errorMessage: Element must occur at least 1 time(s) and no more than 1 time(s).

element.label: Referenced section(s)
element.errorMessage: Element must occur at least 1 time(s) and no more than 100 time(s).

author.desc: Look up the person records in the database to identify the canonical author. Try different spellings in different languages! If no suitable record exists, create a new one. Add additional authors as required.

persName.desc: Look up the person records in the database. Try different spellings in different languages! If no suitable record exists, create a new one. Add additional persons as required.

incipit.desc: Transcribe the opening words of the text unit of sufficient length to identify the work with confidence.

explicit.desc: Transcribe the closing words of the text unit, exclusive of any rubric or colophon which might follow.

quote.desc: Transcribe relevant portion of the text.

date.desc: Fill in the date in CE. The date refers to the acquisition (not the production of the copy).

textLang.desc: Choose a primary language. If the text contains passages in other languages, enter them in the field Other languages.

note.desc: Choose between manuscript witness or text edition in the type field.

ptr.desc: The link to the Zotero will be filled out automatically.

citedRange.desc: Specify which pages, columns, etc. you are refering to.
